sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for March 21 - 22

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St:
event: Monday March 23 thru Friday March 27.  Closure scheduled 24 hrs/day.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St:
event: The southeastbound lane of Bolivar St (from S Broadway to Plunkett St) will be closed for major sewer line work.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St:
event: Traffic from S Broadway and Oliver Lewis Way will be detoured via Cedar St.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St:
event: Note:  Bolivar St from Plunkett St toward S Broadway will remain open for one-way traffic only.

day: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St:
event: Please see the map diagram for details and detour routes.
